backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing user profiles, premium flags, pairing via tokens, and check‑in storage with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new schema by adding a default premium=false field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping premium-related frontend updates to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme definitions with custom OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling auth flow, profile setup, pairing, and routing to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button with Internet Identity integration and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared page layout with header, partner badge, optional auth button, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: UI component for submitting daily check-ins with emoji and message, handling premium limits and submission states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available emoji options and the maximum check-in message length.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check-in status for the user and partner, showing latest entries and loading states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: React Query hook to fetch historical check-ins using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Mutation hook for submitting a new check-in and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: React Query hook to fetch today's check-ins from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Displays up to 30 past check-ins with timestamps and user/partner distinctions.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard view combining today’s status, check-in composer, and history tabs.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: UI for generating invite codes and joining a partner using a token with copy and error handling.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Hook to generate and store an invite token through the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Hook for joining a partner using an invite token and refreshing pairing-related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Fetches pairing status and partner profile, exposing partner data and loading state.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Modal for entering and saving a user's display name via a mutation and refreshing the profile query.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Hook that fetches the current user's profile from the actor when available.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Hook that queries whether the current user has a premium subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that queries are organized per feature.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, architecture notes, and premium limitations for a relationship check‑in app using Firebase. Lists implemented features such as authentication, pairing, daily check-ins, dashboard, theming, and premium multi-check-in support.
